sourcesContent:
import moment from "moment"; import { Button, Card, CardBody, CardSubtitle, CardTitle, Input, Label, Modal, ModalBody, ModalHeader, Table } from "reactstrap"; import React, {useState} from "react"; const WorkoutDayCard = ({date, workout}) => { const [modal, setModal] = useState(false); const toggle = () => { setModal(!modal); }; const day = moment(date).format('ddd'); const noWorkout = () => workout === undefined; return (
{noWorkout() ? ( {day} {/*workout content*/}
Exercise Reps Sets Achieved
Create a workout ) : ( {day} {workout.name} {workout.exercises.map(e => )}
Exercise Reps Sets Achieved
{e.name} {e.reps} {e.sets}
Create a workout )}
) }; export default WorkoutDayCard;
